title: Lulu Whimsy Sound Effect Bug
body: I've noticed that when casting whimsy on herself using the Star Guardian Lulu skin, the speed boost sound effect will continue to play even after the effect wears off. If whimsy is cast on her a second time, the sound effect will work properly. Once cast again, the initial bug appears. Basically every other cast of whimsy will have a never-ending sound effect from what I've noticed.

replies.body:
Hey Neato Mojito (cute name :3)! 

Thanks for the report! We'll take a look into this today and see what's going on! ^-^

**EDIT:** I wasn't able to get a repro on this one. Have you seen this occurring in more than one game? If so, I'd suggest doing a client repair 'cause there may be something wonky with your audio files.
Hmm I have indeed, it happens each time I use the skin. I will attempt a client repair tonight and see if that fixes it. Thanks!
Sounds good - lemme know if that fixes it!
\o/ I've only tested it a couple times, but it seems to have been fixed.
